Texts.Chs: 收获或者长出^orange;5个土豆^reset;并带给^green;韦尔奇^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Gather or Grow ^orange;5 potatos^reset; and return to ^green;Welchie^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 你好啊！ 除了那个长得像^green;鼻涕虫的家伙^reset;，我好久没见过别的新灵魂了。如果你想逃离这个世界，我也许可以帮你一点忙，也许吧。 带给我说的..^orange;5个土豆^reset;，然后我们再谈谈。一间^orange;温室^reset;可以帮你做些什么，在必要的时候。
Texts.Eng: Hi there! I've not seen another new soul besides that ^green;slug-lookin' feller^reset; in a long time. If yer fixin' to escape this world, I kin help a bit, maybe. Bring me say...^orange;5 potatos^reset;, and we'll talk. A ^orange;Greenhouse^reset; might help you make some, in a pinch.

Texts.Chs: 朋友，谢谢你的美味小食。为了表示感谢，你可以在这个地方还不错的时候把这些我爷爷存的^green;铁矿石^reset;储藏留着。它对我来说一文不值，但对你肯定有用！
Texts.Eng: Thanks fer the tasty tots, friend. As a thanks, you can have this store of ^green;Iron Ore^reset; my grand-papa kept around when this place was still nice. T'aint worth a thing to me, but it'll sure be useful for you!
